thread.title: Zac Brown is wearing a Nats hat in TBS's ad for NL postseason coverage
thread.title_full: Zac Brown is wearing a Nats hat in TBS's ad for NL postseason coverage

title: Zac Brown is wearing a Nats hat in TBS's ad for NL postseason coverage
text:
Zac Brown is wearing a Nats hat in TBS’s ad for NL postseason coverage Resize Text By Scott Allen October 2 at 3:09 PM Follow @ScottSAllen (Via TBS) 
If one were to pick a walk-up song to describe the Nationals’s nearly completed season, one could do worse than the “Disaster” score from “SimCity .” Is that a tornado, or another Matt Williams mound visit? 
Zac Brown Band’s “Heavy is the Head,” would also work, as the defending NL East champion Nationals wilted under the weight of enormous preseason expectations . “Heavy is the Head” is actually featured in TBS’s commercial for its National League playoff coverage, which most people in April — and even August — figured would include the Nationals. 
[ You might be sad about the Nats, but at least you don’t have this tattoo ] 
The spot serves as a harsh reminder of what could’ve been for Washington’s baseball team this season. Amid highlights featuring the NL’s five playoff teams, there’s footage from what appears to be Zac Brown Band’s concert at Nationals Park in August. Brown is wearing a Nats cap. @dcsportsbog here’s my photo from the concert. pic.twitter.com/gBHxM816RR 
— The Gray Lot (@theGrayLot) October 2, 2015 
“It’s a life long expedition,” Brown sings. “Second guessing your decisions. Trying to find out what’s been missing Pages keep on filling.” 
(via @theGrayLot ) Scott Allen writes about all things D.C. sports. Follow him on Twitter @ScottSAllen or e-mail him if you’ve got a tip to share. sports Success! Check your inbox for details. You might also like: Please enter a valid email address Sign Up
